details.title: PM Modi arrives at HICC
details.content: Prime Minister  Narendra Modi arrives at the summit venue at HICC for the inauguration of the Global Entrepreneurship Summirt 2017.

details.title: WATCH | Ivanka Trump reaches Hyderabad

details.content: Participants are eagerly awaiting White House adviser Ivanka Trump, Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Telangana Chief Minister K Chandrasekhara Rao, who are expected to address the plenary at 4.30 pm.
PM Modi meets Ivanka Trump, say TV reports.

Stage is set for the 2017 Global Entrepreneurship Summit. Stay tuned for updates. #GlobalEntrepreneurshipSummit #GES2017 pic.twitter.com/EG21SRF4xL

— U.S. Embassy India (@USAndIndia) November 28, 2017

details.title: WATCH | Ivanka Trump welcomed at GE Summit venue in Hyderabad
Global networking of Entrepreneurs
details.content: The event which is being held at the sprawling HICC in Gachibowli will see entrepreneurs from US, Afghanistan, Israel, Nigeria, Australia and India to network with each other, pitch for funding, hear from venture capitalists on starting and running a business, avoiding failures failing better.

Hand in hand. EAM @SushmaSwaraj met @IvankaTrump, Advisor to the US President and Leader of the US delegation at #GES2017 in Hyderabad; had a productive discussion on women entrepreneurship and empowerment. pic.twitter.com/cbdGhhyn3G

— Raveesh Kumar (@MEAIndia) November 28, 2017

Roads have been emptied with some schools and colleges shut for the day, while companies asked employees to work from home. Flyovers have been painted, street lights fixed, and billboards erected en route the venue.

details.title: PM Narendra Modi meets Advisor to POTUS Ivanka Trump
details.content:
The #GES2017 will go a long way in strengthening India-US bilateral ties. Will provide a huge impetus to entrepreneurship in India! pic.twitter.com/bAiRYu65rx

— NITI Aayog (@NITIAayog) November 28, 2017

details.title: IN PICTURES | Hyderabad gears up to welcome Ivanka Trump
details.content: Hyderabad has been on its toes for months to welcome Advisor to President of United States Ivanka Trump. Click on the image below for gallery:

Union Defence Minister Nirmala Sitharaman will be speaking at the opening plenary session on "Be the Change-Women's Entrepreneurial Leadership" at 5:20 pm. She will be sharing the panel with IvankaTrump Marcus Wallenberg, Chairman of SEBGroup.
PM Narendra Modi and Ivanka Trump to address the summit shortly as the two dignitaries arrive at HICC in Hyderabad's Gachibowli.

13-year-old Hamish Finlayson from Australia is the centre of attraction among 1,500 delegates at the Global Entrepreneurship Summit.

READ HERE

details.title: Theme of GES 2017
details.content: The theme of the three-day event is 'Women first, prosperity for all.'
PM Narendra Modi and Ivanka Trump tour the virtual exhibition at GES 2017. Below is one such exhibit. (R Satish babu | EPS)

Defence Minister @nsitharaman arrives at HICC for the Inaugural of #GES2017. pic.twitter.com/aeUQdGlPR4

— NITI Aayog (@NITIAayog) November 28, 2017

PM Narendra Modi, Ivanka Trump, Telangana governor ESL Narasimhan, external affairs minister Sushma Swaraj and Defence minister Nirmala Sitharaman make way to the dias. 

PM Modi to make the opening remarks shortly.

#GES2017 has an interesting mix of delegates, youngest entrepreneur is 13 yrs, oldest is 84! @gsvasu_tnie @NewIndianXpress @ranjim @nilesh_tnie

— Sunithanatti (@sunithanatti) November 28, 2017

Hon'ble PM @narendramodi and @IvankaTrump greeted with a resounding applause as they arrive at the Inaugural plenary of #GES2017 pic.twitter.com/YvPEuEcot3

— NITI Aayog (@NITIAayog) November 28, 2017

The Global Entrepreneurship Summit 2017, in its 8th year comes to Hyderabad, India, where cultures, ideas and ideators meet, over 2.5 power-packed days. #GES2017 pic.twitter.com/FipAFbXSSL

— NITI Aayog (@NITIAayog) November 28, 2017

details.title: GES 2017 off to a colourful start
details.content: Artistes give dance performances at HICC.
Telangana chief minister K Chandrasekhar gives the welcome address.

The 4 key innovative industries of #GES2017- Healthcare, Digital Economy, Energy & Infra, and Media, inaugurated! pic.twitter.com/HdcGr58sDi

— NITI Aayog (@NITIAayog) November 28, 2017
Taking major strides to further Ease of Doing Business, Telangana is proud to host the world’s biggest Entrepreneurship Summit: Telangana CM K Chandrasekhar Rao.
A specially designed robot by a Bengaluru-based startup welcomed Ivanka Trump. (Associated Press)
Ivanka Trump takes the stage to address the Global entrepreneurship Summit.
The people of India inspires us all: Ivanka Trump

We bring all the action from #GES2017 in Hyderabad LIVE to you! Tune in at 4.30pm IST & watch PM @narendramodi inau… https://t.co/jyNzvxLJdM

— NITI Aayog (@NITIAayog) November 28, 2017
Hyderabad's tech might soon outshine its biriyani, says Ivanka.

This is the first time India has hosted the Global Entrepreneurship Summit. It is a symbol of the strengthened friendship between our two peoples, and the growing economic and security partnership between our two nations, says Ivanka.

This year’s Summit is focused on a theme that is key to our future: WOMEN FIRST, PROSPERITY FOR ALL. I am proud that for the first time ever, women make up the majority of the 1500 entrepreneurs selected to attend. Only when women are empowered to thrive; will our families, our economies, and our societies reach their fullest potential: Ivanka Trump

.@IvankaTrump: "Entrepreneurs are revolutionizing our economies, and improving our societies" #GES2017 pic.twitter.com/4hD4Nfdxme

— GES2017 (@GES2017) November 28, 2017

In the last decade, women have made remarkable strides in starting new businesses... Today, more than 11 mn women in the United States own businesses. They employ nearly 9 mn workers, and generate over $1 trillion in revenue, says Ivanka Trump at #GES2017
We must ensure that women entrepreneurs have access to capital, networks, resources & equitable laws: Ivanka Trump at #GES2017. (Picture courtesy: Niti Aayog/Twitter)
We must ensure women entrepreneurs have access to capital, access to networks and mentors, and access to equitable laws.: Ivanka Trump at #GES2017

.@IvankaTrump:When women work, it creates a unique multiplier effect.Women are more likely than men to hire other women, and to give them access to capital, mentorship and networks.Women are also more likely to reinvest their income back in their families & communities. #GES2017

— GES2017 (@GES2017) November 28, 2017
PM Narendra Modi takes the dias to deliver the inaugural address.

.@IvankaTrump to #Womenpreneurs: You prove to the world that we have the power to rise above the challenges of our day – to pioneer new pathways forward – and to leave our mark on this moment in history. #GES2017 pic.twitter.com/i23ujM4Ja9

— GES2017 (@GES2017) November 28, 2017
GES 2017 connects Hyderabad to Silicon valley: PM Narendra Modi

India is happy to host #GES2017, in partnership with USA. https://t.co/yoNOkDNSWZ pic.twitter.com/HYbuYMHkJr

— PMO India (@PMOIndia) November 28, 2017
The theme "Women First, Prosperity of All" makes this edition of GES stand out.

Women are the incarnation of Shakthi; India believes in women's empowerment: PM @narendramodi #GES2017 @NewIndianXpress

— Jonathan Ananda (@JonathanSAnanda) November 28, 2017

This very city of Hyderabad is home to the champions of the world - Sania Mirza, PV Sindhu and Sania Nehwal. These women have made India proud! Here at #GES2017 more than 50 percent Entrepreneurs are women: PM @narendramodi pic.twitter.com/IEnZDridVE

— NITI Aayog (@NITIAayog) November 28, 2017

Process of reforms is not complete. Not satisfied with 100th rank (EODB). Have launched MUDRA... 90 million loans worth 4.28trillion rupees have been sanction, 70 miliion to women entrepreneurs, says PM Modi at GES2017

We have launched @AIMtoInnovate with over 900 Atal Tinkering Labs to promote a culture of innovation among children. We have also launched 19 Incubation Centres to further innovation across India: PM @narendramodi pic.twitter.com/7wJT4xn2Zp

— NITI Aayog (@NITIAayog) November 28, 2017

details.title: Get all the live updates here
details.content:
Woman is the incarnation of Shakthi, the goddess of power; we believe in women empowerment, says @narendramodi at #GlobalEntrepreneurshipSummit.
Read the LIVE UPDATES: https://t.co/zyOvoVczPH

— New Indian Express (@NewIndianXpress) November 28, 2017
Come, Make in India, Invest in India- for India, and for the world: PM Modi at GES 2017
Union minister of external affairs Sushma Swaraj delivers the vote of thanks.
PM Narendra Modi has brought to India the Mantra of Sabka Saath, Sabka Vikas. Empowerment for All by encouraging all: Minister of External Affairs, Sushma Swaraj at GES 2017.
"Women Entrepreneurs are an epitome of courage and leadership. Ivanka Trump is a passionate advocate of education and empowerment of girls," says EAM Sushma Swaraj at GES 2017.
The inaugural session draws to an end on the first day of the three-day event at HICC.
The inauguration session of the Global Entrepreneurship Summit 2017 has concluded.
